attributes.action: save Cambridge United from relegation by sacking Jimmy Quinn
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jimmy Quinn has no idea about football, he has limited budget for sure but he is useless and we will be playing Conference South football unless Tony comes and saves us.  He said he is standing down, maybe he could lead us????

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
